overview: Organisational change is one of the greatest challenge facing managers in today's uncertain, volatile, ambiguous and competitive environment. Effective management requires an unprecedented degree of agility, and the current competitive environment puts unprecedented stress on organisation's and people's ability to change. This course will connect strategy, organisation and leadership concepts with managerial practices to provide students with strategies for setting and maintaining the course of change in an organisation.
intended learning outcomes: Prioritise the strategic reasons for change.
Assess the change potential and capabilities of a given organisation.
Create and manage alliances for change.
Develop their leadership skills in change situations.
